name: Baneful Bunker
effect: Reaction. Shield move. Used in reaction to the user being targeted, reducing incoming damage by 3. If the move that strikes the user is a Contact move, the foe is now Poisoned
description: The user encloses itself inside it's sturdy shell of which is covered in poisonous barbs. If a barb pricks the foe's skin, the wound would start to fester.
